abstract.para: &kiwi; is a system for creating operating system images. With &kiwi; you can create LiveCDs, LiveDVDs, flash disks to use for Linux-supported hardware platforms and virtual disks for virtualization and cloud systems (like &xen;, &kvm;, &vmware;, EC2 and more). The images created by &kiwi; can also be used in a PXE environment to boot from network.
For comprehensive &kiwi; documentation, see or install the kiwi-doc package on your system.
With &yast; &imgcreator;, &productname; also provides a graphical interface for &kiwi;. For details, refer to .
